title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration and a simple REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python SDK.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts and utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG apps with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps Ollama for native UI interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama’s local models into LangChain LLM, chat, and embedding interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Community-curated list of hacks, tips, and experimental features for running and extending Ollama.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration that adds a shareable, interactive chat UI on top of any Ollama model with one command.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion and chat powered by Ollama into your editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama containerized on Linux, macOS, or Windows.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive (RxJava) APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (rich markdown, syntax highlighting, history) for chatting with Ollama models written in Python.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Unity via REST and gRPC.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama with JWT auth, rate limiting, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of ready-to-use Modelfiles for fine-tuned, uncensored, and domain-specific models.
